canvas.title: ğŸ¨ Draw Curve Fitting
canvas.description: Draw the curve you want to fit on the canvas below
canvas.use_canvas_image_help: Pass canvas image to vision-capable models (like Gemini) to help understand fitting target. Note: Models without vision capability will ignore this option.

file_upload.title: ğŸ“ Upload File Fitting
file_upload.description: Support NPZ data file upload with complete variable and unit configuration
file_upload.file_help: Upload NPZ file containing 'x', 'y' and optional 'error' keys
file_upload.error_missing_keys: âŒ NPZ file must contain 'x' and 'y' keys!
file_upload.error_x_dimension: âŒ Input data 'x' must be 2D array (n_samples, n_features)!
file_upload.error_y_dimension: âŒ Output data 'y' must be 1D array (n_samples,)!
file_upload.success_loaded: âœ… Successfully loaded data: {samples} samples, {features} features
file_upload.upload_instruction: ğŸ‘† Please upload NPZ data file to continue configuration

config.api_keys_help: Specify JSON file path containing API keys
config.models_help: Select one or more LLM models for fitting
config.no_models_warning: No available models found, please check API keys file
config.functions_help: Select mathematical functions available for fitting
config.constants_help: Allow using predefined mathematical constants (like Ï€) in expressions
config.island_help: Number of parallel evolution populations, increase to improve diversity
config.cycle_help: Number of generations in evolutionary algorithm, more cycles usually yield better results
config.interaction_help: Number of LLM calls per cycle
config.score_help: Automatically stop fitting when this score is reached
config.samplers_help: Number of parallel sampling worker threads
config.evaluators_help: Number of parallel evaluation worker threads
config.temperature_help: Control randomness of generation, higher means more random
config.examples_help: Number of examples included in each prompt
config.generate_help: Number of expressions generated per LLM call
config.threshold_help: Score threshold for exchanging ideas between islands
config.fuzzy_help: Use natural language theoretical descriptions as intermediate step
config.translator_help: Model used to convert theoretical descriptions to expressions
config.mutation_help: Enable expression mutation operations to increase search diversity
config.crossover_help: Enable expression crossover operations to combine different expression features
config.trial_help: Number of parameter optimization trials per expression, reducing can significantly improve fitting speed (recommended: 5)
config.points_help: Number of data points after interpolation
config.interpolate_help: Interpolate data points for more uniform distribution

variable_config.title: âš™ï¸ Variable Configuration
variable_config.description: Configure variable names, units, and descriptions for the fitting process to ensure generated expressions are more physically meaningful
variable_config.input_desc_help: Describe the physical meaning and purpose of input data
variable_config.feature_config_desc: Configure variable information for {count} input features:
variable_config.var_name_help: Symbol name of the {index}th input variable
variable_config.var_unit_help: Physical unit of the {index}th input variable
variable_config.var_desc_help: Physical meaning of the {index}th input variable
variable_config.unit_validation_help: Enable dimensional analysis to ensure generated expressions are physically correct

warnings.fill_variable_names: âš ï¸ Please configure variable names for all features
warnings.fill_units: âš ï¸ When unit validation is enabled, please configure units for all variables
warnings.fill_output_unit: âš ï¸ When unit validation is enabled, please fill in output variable unit
warnings.select_models: âš ï¸ Please select at least one model in sidebar
warnings.select_functions: âš ï¸ Please select at least one function in sidebar

results.final_result_title: Final Fitting Result: Prediction vs Actual (Score: {score:.4f})
